prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a stoic Japanese martial artist, strong facial features, messy black hair, determined intense gaze, red headband, muscular physique, 8k cinematic photo
feature_prompt: realistic muscle definition, visible fabric weave on weathered gi, sweat on skin, dirt on bare feet, detailed hair strands, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, glowing eyes, magic effects, perfect teeth, friendly face, low quality, blurry, underwear
